intro: Epidendrum paniculosum, commonly known as the showy Epidendrum, is a tropical orchid native to Central and South America. It is characterized by its upright growth habit and large, showy flowers that bloom in clusters. The plant produces pendulous inflorescences with brightly colored, fragrant flowers that attract pollinators such as bees and butterflies.
